text.tspan: Share of direct primary energy consumption by source, World
Measured as a percentage of direct primary energy. This means that fossil fuels include the energy lost due to
Data source: Energy Institute - Statistical Review of World Energy (2024)
Note: Other renewables include bioenergy, geothermal, wave, and tidal, but not traditional biofuels.
